QuestData.Title: King Without a Crown
QuestData.Description:
This ancient proto-dragon must have been a glorious creature when it was alive--perhaps the largest the Wild Preserve has ever seen.
But it wasn't enough. Observe the skeleton more closely, so we may learn the story of its final moments.
QuestData.RewardText:
So, a fight to the death with something just as strong? I wonder if it was protecting the preserve from invaders?
Thank you, $n. It's good to remember the sacrifices of those that have come before us.
